text: Bryanthus is a genus of ornamental plant in the flowering plant family Ericaceae. In 2012, the new tribe Bryantheae was proposed based on genetic analysis, containing the genera Bryanthus and Ledothamnus. == Species == * Bryanthus aleuticus (A. Gray) * Bryanthus empetriformis (A. Gray) * Bryanthus × erectus (Lindl. & Paxt.) * Bryanthus glanduliflorus (A. Gray) * Bryanthus intermedius (Hook.) * Bryanthus musciformis (Poir.) == References == * * Webster, A. D. Hardy Ornamental Flowering Trees and Shrubs Category:Ericoideae Category:Ericaceae genera
title: Bryanthus
